title: Extreme fps drops after new patch !
body:
Hello, can somebody help me ?
After recent patch im running on 30-60 fps, it even sometimes freeze ( normally i have 200+), my pc drivers etc. seems fine in fact it all started immediately after patch with warring kingdom skins. I asked couple guys in rankeds and they have the same. 
Does anybody find a solution ? Thanks for replies.

replies.body:
Are you using the new *Crest of the Rooster* Ward Skin in-game when these issues occur? We've had some reports that this issue is directly tied to using this ward skin, so if you were using it before, I recommend testing a few matches *without* using this ward skin to see if anything changes.

Let me know!

Hey! 
Thanks for reply, i checked that ward skin and used the originall one and without any lag ! thank you so much. Im so happy that i dont need to reinstall LOL etc.. :) <3
Try if it works still we never know!!
